assetProfile.address2: House No. G-1, 34/1 East Punjabi Bagh
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Vikas Multicorp Limited trades in various chemicals compounds, polymers, PVC resins, plastic granules, and items related to plastic industry in India. It is also involved in the real estate business; and the manufacture of recycled material for automotive, packaging, sheathing, and textile industries. The company was formerly known as Moonlite Technochem Limited and changed its name to Vikas Multicorp Limited in January 2017. Vikas Multicorp Limited was founded in 1995 and is based in New Delhi, India.
